wxMenuCmd Class Reference

Represents a wxCmd which just generates a wxEVT_COMMAND_MENU_SELECTED when is executed. More...

Detailed Description

Represents a wxCmd which just generates a wxEVT_COMMAND_MENU_SELECTED when is executed.

void wxMenuCmd::Register (  wxMenuBar *  p  )  [inline, static]
 

Register this type of command into wxCmd static array.

Also calls the SetMenuBar function with the given pointer.

void wxMenuCmd::SetMenuBar (  wxMenuBar *  p  )  [inline, static]
 

Sets the menubar which will be used to search the menu items with the IDs given to the CreateNew function.

void wxMenuCmd::Update (   )  [protected, virtual]
 

Updates the associated menu item; in particularly, adds, removes or changes the first shortcut which is shown next to the menuitem label.

The 2nd, 3rd, 4th... shortcuts cannot be shown in the menuitem label and they are thus not considered... (but they do still work !!!)

Reimplemented from wxCmd.
